meanings.definition: Leather made from the skin of a calf.
meanings.sent1: The shoemaker crafted a beautiful pair of shoes from soft calfskin.
meanings.sent2: The luxurious handbag was made of genuine calfskin.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to chew on the calfskin, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her gloves felt like a second skin, as smooth as calfskin.
meanings.sent5: The scent of new calfskin filled the room, reminding her of the countryside.

meanings.definition: The skin of a calf used for making leather.
meanings.sent1: The tannery received a fresh shipment of calfskin for processing.
meanings.sent2: The artisan carefully inspected the quality of the calfskin before starting the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the tender calfskin looked more appetizing than the steak.
meanings.sent4: The book cover felt like calfskin, smooth and durable.
meanings.sent5: The calfskin had a natural sheen that caught the light beautifully.
